title: New Colors for the 2025 Ibis Hakka
content:
Ibis Cyclesâ€™ Hakka MX has been featured here numerous times over the years and remains one of the best carbon gravel bikes on the market. Not one to mess with perfection, the Santa Cruz-based brand gave the Hakka a splash of new color for 2025 with Lemongrass green (above) and Cleanslate Gray. The frame and fork pricing is set at $2199 with SRAM Apex builds at $3299 and Rival at $4599. Check out more at Ibis Cycles and be sure to check out our reviews of the Hakka below in our Related Archives.
